name: Piggy's Casino
description:
THIS GAME WAS ORIGINALLY CREATED FOR THE GMTK 2022 GAME JAM. 

I made this for the game jam but mistakenly thought the submit deadline was much later than in reality. Either way this was made in 2 days which is why it's so short.

You've recently been hired to work for a casino that's down on its luck, with $250 in the bank and only one paying patron left. Will you be able to keep this patron engaged for long enough to save the Casino?

Credits:

Font- Façade by Éléonore Fines, obtained through the Elvetyne Type Foundry website

Music- Holiday by LuKremBo
